ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 1st of all, i think 30 to 35 are the worst levels for all classes. well, let s try to find you some help. did you have a look at
ygData.messageBody:
> So how does one get from level 30 to level 50 in the shortest amount
> [...]
> I hate for my rogue to fall by the way side because he's become a bore
> to play. So any suggestions you have for playing rogue characters to
> help me out would be appreciated.

1st of all, i think 30 to 35 are the worst levels for all classes.

well, let's try to find you some help. did you have a look at
http://www.thesafehouse.org/
IMHO this is the site for EQ rogues, even if i don't know this site, but
many rouges i met always referred to it.

i would also have a look at allakhazam and eq-atlas to find zones for
certain level ranges and then just have a look at them.

another thing is: if you currently don't like to play (a certain char),
just don't do it. try something else, but just don't suffer a burnout!
it is a game and we pay for it to have fun, not to get annoyed...

i am playing EQ for four years now and from time to time i need some
distance aka vacation from EQ... ;-)


have fun
- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
charachters listing: http://muog.de/chars.html
